en: So woe to those who write the "scripture" with their own hands,

ar: ثُمَّ يَقُولُونَ هَـٰذَا مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ

en: in order to exchange it for a small price.
Woe to them for what their hands have written
and woe to them for what they earn.
And they say, "Never will the Fire touch us,
Say, "Have you taken a covenant with Allah?
For Allah will never break His covenant.

ar: أَمْ تَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
en: Or do you say about Allah that which you do not know?"
